title: IEEE Day 2023
shortDescription: Everything you need to know about IEEE Day 2023
content:
We hope your brief detention in the relaxation vault has been a pleasant one.

Your specimen has been processed and we are now ready to begin the test proper.

title: IEEEXtreme 18.0
shortDescription: Information about registration, prizes, and more!
content: IEEEXtreme 18.0 is orangized by the IEEE Montreal at Polytechnique from Friday evening to Saturday evening. The contest will be 24 hours, with sets of questions every few hours.

title: IEEE Banquet 2023
shortDescription: IEEE Annual Event with food and drinks
